details.cryptoInstructions:
Enter promo code YLCrypto
Make your first crypto deposit of at least 10 USDT (or equivalent)
Receive your bonus automatically
details.cryptoDetails:
1. The bonus is available daily on the first cryptocurrency deposit of the day.
2. The bonus amount is 7%.
3. The minimum deposit amount is 10 USDT (or equivalent).
4. The maximum bonus amount is 50 USDT (or equivalent).
5. Wager: x1.
6. The bonus is available once within the period from 00:00 to 23:59 UTC.
7. The wagering period is 24 hours from the moment of crediting.
8. Withdrawals are unavailable while a bonus is active.
details.standardInstructions:
Register or log in
Deposit at least $10
Play with your boosted balance

crash.title: Crash
crash.description:
Games categorized as "Crash Games" by the providers.
All online casino games where players bet on the outcome of a rapidly increasing multiplier.
The objective is to cash out before the multiplier crashes, which can happen at any moment.
Examples: Aviator, JetX, Crash, Coin Flip, Rocket.

term.bonusIntro: The bonus is available only on the first deposit
term.step1: 1. Log in or register an account.
term.step3: 3. Make a deposit starting from 10 USD.
term.rule1: 1. The 100% bonus offer is available from 30.05.2025 until 31.12.2025.
term.rule2: 2. Activation is only possible on the first deposit.
term.rule3: 3. The maximum bonus amount is 1500 USD / 130,000 RUB.
term.rule4: 4. To activate the bonus offer, a single deposit of at least 10 USD / 1,000 RUB is required.
term.rule5: 5. Bonus funds will be credited to the Bonus Balance.
term.rule6: 6. Only bets placed on slots from the <0>"Games for bonus"</0> section count towards the wagering requirement.
term.rule7: 7. The bonus is wagered using the real balance first ‚Äî specifically, the portion on which the bonus was credited ‚Äî and then from the bonus balance.
term.rule8: 8. The bonus balance becomes available to all players who have wagered the deposit amount from their main balance. To continue playing using bonus funds, go to the "Balance Panel" (located in the website header), select "Bonus Balance" or visit "My wallets" section and activate "Bonus Balance" with a single click. If the activation is successful, a green indicator will appear next to "Bonus Balance." In case of an error, the system will automatically display a corresponding notification.
term.rule9: 9. The bonus amount must be wagered 35 times.
term.rule10: 10. Winnings from bets that do not count towards the wagering requirement will be credited to the real balance, but these funds cannot be used to wager the bonus.
term.rule11: 11. If a deposit is made while a bonus is active, the deposited amount can be used to meet the wagering requirement.
term.rule12: 12. The wagering period for the qualified deposit and the bonus percentage is 7 days from the moment of crediting.
term.rule13: 13. After completing the bonus wagering, a wagering requirement of X1 must be met for withdrawal according to the site rules.
term.rule14: 14. Withdrawal is not available during an active bonus.
term.rule15: 15. Only one bonus can be active in the casino at any given time.
term.rule16: 16. After fulfilling the wagering requirement, the winnings will be transferred to the real balance.
term.rule17: 17. If you cancel the bonus, the remaining funds in the real balance will be subject to a X1 wagering requirement, and the bonus funds will be canceled.
term.rule18: 18. The promotion is valid for only one phone number, account, address, IP address, bank card number, or crypto account. Repeated participation in the promotion is not allowed. Participating in the promotion under a different identity will result in the cancellation of results and account blocking without refunding any funds.

If you do not accept these Terms, you should refrain from accessing the Service and using the Website.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: These terms and conditions and the documents referred to below ("Terms") apply to the use of the current website yourloot.io ("Website") and its related or connected services (collectively, the "Service").

generalTerms.title: 2. General Terms
generalTerms.content: We reserve the right to revise and amend the Terms (including any documents referred to and linked to below) at any time. You should visit this page periodically to review the Terms and Conditions. Amendments will be binding and effective immediately upon publication on this Website. If you object to any such changes, you must immediately stop using the Service. Your continued use of the Website following such publication will indicate your agreement to be bound by the Terms as amended. Any bets not settled prior to the changed Terms taking effect will be subject to the pre-existing Terms.

obligations.title: 3. Your Obligations
obligations.content: You acknowledge that at all times when accessing the Website and using the Service:
items: You are over 18, or the legal age at which gambling, or gaming activities are allowed under the law or jurisdiction that applies to you. We reserve the right to request proof of age documents from you at any time.
You are of legal capacity and can enter into a binding legal agreement with us. You must not access the Website or utilize the Service if you are not of legal capacity.

You are a resident in a jurisdiction that allows gambling. You are not a resident of any country in which access to online gambling to its residents or to any person within such country is prohibited. It is your sole responsibility to ensure that your use of the service is legal.
You may not use a VPN, proxy or similar services or devices that mask or manipulate the identification of your real location.
You are the authorized user of the payment method you use.
You must make all payments to us in good faith and not attempt to reverse a payment made or take any action which will cause such payment to be reversed by a third party.
When placing bets you may lose some or all of your money deposited to the Service in accordance with these Terms and you will be fully responsible for that loss.
When placing bets you must not use any information obtained in breach of any legislation in force in the country in which you were when the bet was placed.
You are not acting on behalf of another party or for any commercial purposes, but solely on your own behalf as a private individual in a personal capacity.
You must not either attempt to manipulate any market or element within the Service in bad faith nor in a manner that adversely affects the integrity of the Service or us.
You must generally act in good faith in relation to us of the Service at all times and for all bets made using the Service.
You, or, if applicable, your employees, employers, agents, or family members, are not registered as an Affiliate in our Affiliate program.

restrictedUse.title: 4. Restricted use
restrictedUse.content: You must not use the Service:
items: If you are under the age of 18 years (or below the age of majority as stipulated in the laws of the jurisdiction applicable to you) or if you are not legally able to enter into a binding legal agreement with us or you acting as an agent for, or otherwise on behalf, of a person under 18 years (or below the age of majority as stipulated in the laws of the jurisdiction applicable to you);
If you reside in a country in which access to online gambling to its residents or to any person within such country is prohibited.
If you are a resident of one of the following countries, or accessing the Website from one of the following countries:

By using this Website and/or accessing the Service, you, whether you are a guest or a registered user with an account ("Account"), agree to be bound by these Terms, together with any amendments, which may be published from time to time. If you do not accept these Terms, you should refrain from accessing the Service and using the Website. The Service is owned by Cintra Soft Ltd. a limited liability company registered in British Virgin Islands with company registration number 2151527 with registered address at 1st Floor, Columbus Centre, PO Box 2283, Road Town Tortola VG 1110, British Virgin Islands ("Company"), licensed in the State of Anjouan under the Computer Gaming Licensing Act 007 of 2005.

content.title: How to Access your profile?
content.content: Answer: Click on the profile icon (avatar or username) in the top-right corner of the screen..

content.whatIsIt: What is it? </br> A section for managing your wallets and currencies.
content.selectCurrency: Selecting balance currency (USD, EUR, RUB, etc.).
content.important: Important: The selected currency affects the display of the balance in all sections.

content.whatIsIt: What is it? </br> A section for working with bonuses and promotions.
content.trackProgress: Tracking progress on bonus programs (e.g., ‚ÄúWelcome Bonus‚Äù).
content.viewOffers: Viewing available promotions and their conditions.

content.whatIsIt: What is it? </br> Your personal collection of favorite games.
content.storeGames: Storing games you play most often.
content.quickLaunch: Quick launch of your favorite slots, poker, or roulette.
content.addRemoveGames: Adding/removing games via the ‚ÄúFavorites‚Äù menu in the game lobby.

content.whatIsIt: What is it? </br> A section for exchanging real balance for in-game currency (IGC).
content.purchaseItems: Purchasing in-game items, participating in tournaments and promotions.

content.whatIsIt: What is it? </br> A section for tracking your in-game accomplishments.
content.viewTasks: Viewing completed and ongoing tasks (e.g., "Play 10 rounds of poker").
content.receiveRewards: Earning rewards for achievements (bonuses, IGC, exclusive items).
content.trackProgress: Tracking progress via an activity progress bar.

content.whatIsIt: What is it? </br> The in-game store.
content.boxes: Boxes: Random sets of items or bonuses.
content.products: Products: Boosters, temporary experience or IGC bonuses.
content.pay: Pay with IGC or real currency.
content.receive: Receive the item in your inventory.

content.title: How to Create a New Wallet?

content.step1: Go to the "Create new wallet" section

content.title: How to Choose a Wallet Currency?

content.step1: Find your desired currency in the list (e.g., BYN ‚Äî Belarusian ruble).

content.title: What to Do After Creating a Wallet?

content.step1: The system will request confirmation ("Wallet create confirmation")
content.step2: If you want to set the new wallet as your primary, a warning will appear:
content.warningText: ‚ÄúAll your active bonuses can be canceled‚Äù

content.title: Can I Have Multiple Fiat Wallets?

content.answer: Yes! You can create as many wallets as needed.
content.switchWallets: To switch between them, use the "Available Wallets" section in the main interface.

content.title: What If I Selected the Wrong Currency?

content.cancelAction: Cancel the action at any stage by clicking "Cancel."
content.contactSupport: If the wallet is already created, contact support for deletion or adjustments. (Support Link)

content.beforeDeposit: Before depositing, ensure you've selected the correct wallet. This affects:
content.balanceCurrency: Balance currency (e.g., selecting a EUR wallet displays balance in euros, not dollars).

content.method1Title: For RUB wallets, three methods are available: </br> </br>Method 1: Card Deposit
method1Steps: Choose a partner bank (e.g., Sberbank, Tinkoff).
Transfer money using the provided details.
content.method1Time: ‚è≥ Processing: 30‚Äì60 minutes. If payment hasn't arrived ‚Äî contact support.
method2Steps: Complete transfer via the fast payment system.
content.method2Time: ‚è≥ Processing: 30‚Äì60 minutes. For delays, contact support.
method3Steps: Copy wallet address or scan QR code.
Send crypto to the provided address.
content.method4Title: Method 4: YooMoney Deposit (Secondary traffic - available after certain actions)
content.supportedCurrencies: Only send supported currencies. Unsupported coins will be lost permanently!
content.networkMatch: Always verify the network matches platform requirements.

content.fiatProcessing: Fiat (RUB/EUR): May take longer than crypto (up to 60 minutes). If not received, contact support.
content.cryptoProcessing: Crypto: Depends on network congestion (10 minutes to several hours).
content.contactSupport: Contact support with payment details attached.
content.saveReceipts: ‚úî Always save payment receipts and transaction hashes.

content.title: How to deposit funds?
content.content: Click "Deposit" in the main menu. Select currency type and follow transfer instructions.

content.title: How to withdraw funds?
content.content: Go to "Withdraw" section. Specify amount and currency type.

content.title: What are "Providers"?
content.content: This section contains our partners and service providers.

content.method1: Method 1: Click "Go to Profile" on the homepage.
content.method2: Method 2: Click the person icon in top-right corner.

content.step2: Click the arrow button ‚Üí next to section name.
Click the arrow button ‚Üí to access settings.

content.tip1: Arrow buttons ‚Üí typically lead to submenus or action panels.
content.tip2: If section won't load: refresh page or check internet connection.

content.content: ‚ö† Important: All sections are only available after authorization. Make sure you are logged into your account.

content.title: Poker
content.content: Classic and modern poker variations: tournaments, Texas Hold'em, Omaha, and other popular formats.

content.title: Fishing Games
content.content: Fishing adventures: catch fish, underwater exploration, and strategic gameplay with fishing gear.

content.title: Mines Games
content.content: Minefield strategy games: treasure hunting, mine defusing, and logic-based puzzles.

content.title: New
content.content: Latest platform additions - fresh launches and exclusive projects.

content.title: Slots
content.content: Classic slot machines featuring jackpots, bonus rounds, and thematic storylines.

content.title: Game Shows
content.content: Interactive show-style games: quizzes, "Wheel of Fortune," and host-led prize draws.

content.title: Blackjack & Roulette
content.content: Traditional blackjack and roulette tables with various betting limits.

content.title: Live Poker
content.content: Poker tournaments featuring live players and dealers.

content.sports: Sports roulette (event betting in Sport section)

content.title: Craps
content.content: Simplified dice games with intuitive rules.

content.title: Scratch Cards
content.content: Virtual scratch-off tickets for instant wins.

content.checkBankAccount: Ensure your bank account is correctly linked
content.enterAmount: Enter withdrawal amount (use ‚Äú+‚Äù buttons or type manually)
content.selectBank: Select your bank from the dropdown

content.bitcoinNetwork: Bitcoin Network: Bitcoin (BTC), Tether (USDT), Binance Coin (BNB).
content.selectCoinNetwork: Select coin and network (e.g., USDT on TRC20).
content.doubleCheckAddresses: Always double-check addresses! Wrong network = permanent loss.

content.contactSupport: Contact support with the payment receipt.

content.cashback: Cashback: Up to 15% of losses (credited on Mondays)
